column5: Youâ€™ll love this spacious professor's home with a New Orleans/French Country ambiance. There is room to spread out and a wonderful flow from the downstairs rooms to two private back decks. The house sits on 2 secluded acres situated on a quiet a cul-de-sac ~2.5 miles from Kyle Field and Texas A&M University. The home has been recently upgraded with new appliances, new carpet in bedrooms and new tile in the living area. Small, well trained pets are allowed and there is even a doggie door!
